ygData.subject: Re: Question of Aesthetics
ygData.msgSnippet: i heard they change at level 48 too, anyone know?  i guess i will find out in the next couple days myself if no one knows, so i ll let you know hehe. Shada
ygData.messageBody:
i heard they change at level 48 too, anyone know? i guess i will find out
in the next couple days myself if no one knows, so i'll let you know hehe.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 47 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
